医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
人工韧带可以彻底改变ACL手术和恢复前交叉韧带（ACL）受伤很常见，尤其是在运动员中。每年，全球进行超过40万ACL重建（ACLR）手术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/artcover-ligaments-could-revolutionize-acl-surogery-andergery-and-recovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/Artaver-ligaments-could-revolutionize-acl-acl-surogery-and-suregery-and-recovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d1bd091-C5D3-47A7-9940-EF845C12952C Thu, 27 Feb 2025 20:21:24 -0500 Artificial ligaments could revolutionize ACL surgery and recovery
AI系统准确地检测到纵向医学图像的变化根据Weill Cornell Medicine，Cornell的Ithaca Campus和Cornell Tech领导的一项研究，一种基于AI的新系统可以准确地检测到变化并预测结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/ai-system-accuratery-detects-changes-in-longudinal-medical-images.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/ai-system-accuratery-detects-changes-in-longudinal-medical-images.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=879deca1-f998-48b8-bffb-81c2a9c5b7f0 Thu, 27 Feb 2025 20:17:52 -0500 AI system accurately detects changes in longitudinal medical images
人造甜味剂可能会降低二甲双胍在体重和葡萄糖控制方面的有效性饮酒人为地甜味饮料可以降低二甲双胍对肥胖症和糖尿病前期年轻患者的有效性，但是需要进行更大的研究来确认这些发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/Artcover-sweeteners-may-reduce-metformine28099s-effectivesion-in-weight-and-weight-and-weight-and-weight-and-weight-and-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/20250227/artcover-sweeteners-may-reduce-metformine28099s-effectivesion-in-weight-n-weight-and-weight-and-weight-and-weight-and-weight-and-welcose-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B46EEAAC-5963-4B02-8B5A-6D439315A7C4 Thu, 27 Feb 2025 20:13:00 -0500 Artificial sweeteners may reduce metformin’s effectiveness in weight and glucose control
研究：八分之一的非洲医院患者死亡率高。根据柳叶刀的一项新研究，非洲医院中八分之一的患者患有重病，一周内五分之一的患者死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/study-one-no--eight-eight-eight-eight-aprican-hospital-patients-critical critically-Ill-with-with-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/study-one-one-in--eight-eight-eight-eight-hospital-patients-critical-critically-critical in-with-with-with-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89f9b230-c9dd-41e3-b6b9-c617f5027774 Thu, 27 Feb 2025 19:53:00 -0500 Study: One in eight African hospital patients critically ill with high mortality
490万美元的赠款旨在使用MDMA和心理治疗增强PTSD治疗得克萨斯大学圣安东尼奥大学健康科学中心的研究人员及其埃默里大学的合作者获得了490万美元的赠款，旨在显着提高患有创伤后应激障碍的人的治疗和恢复率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/2449-million-grant-aims-to-enhance-ptsd-ptsd-wareatment-using-mdma-pstsd-using-mdma and-persycherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/2449-million-亿grant-aims-to-enhance-ptsd-wareatment--使用mdma-and-pssychapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50DDB721-5DA2-4517-9B54-E8552BC4CB8D Thu, 27 Feb 2025 19:49:01 -0500 $4.9 million grant aims to enhance PTSD treatment using MDMA and psychotherapy
科学家发现脑血管中的糖盾如何防止衰老和疾病研究人员揭示，脑内皮糖脂中粘蛋白型O-糖基化的损失会削弱血脑屏障，从而导致衰老和神经退行性疾病的渗透性，神经炎症和认知下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/scientists-uncover-how-a-a-a-sugar-sugar-sugar-sugar-sugar-brain-brain-brain-brain-vessels-protects-protects-protects-gainst-gainst-gainstiging-gaingagigant-agigain-against-ging-ang-ang-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/scientists-uncover-now-a-a-a-sugar-sugar-sugar-sugar-sugar-brain-brain-brain-brain-brain-vessels-protects-protects-protects-gainst-gainst aggainSt-agigage-againSt-aging-anging-and-and-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc4e56ac-d475-4e98-bd0e-d985c53d9493 Thu, 27 Feb 2025 19:49:00 -0500 Scientists uncover how a sugar shield in brain blood vessels protects against aging and disease
新的大脑图揭示了对多发性硬化症发展的见解NIH研究揭示了疾病发作和修复的主要参与者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/new-brain-map-reveals-ingights-into-multiple-sclerosis-defervepent.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/new-brain-brain-map-reveals-ingights-into-multiple-sclerisosis-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0d0df6881-9bef-452d-bbd7-847614beb556 Thu, 27 Feb 2025 19:44:00 -0500 New brain map reveals insights into multiple sclerosis development
KFF健康新闻“什么健康？”：房屋共和党计划针对医疗补助众议院共和党的预算提案在周二险些通过，这可能会导致医疗补助的大幅度削减，这是针对低收入或残疾的人的卫生计划，以帮助减税支付。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/kff-health-news-what-what-the-health-house-house-gop-plan-plan-trangets-medicaid.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/kff-health-news-whath-what-the-health-house-house-gop-plan-plan-trangets-medicaid.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7f16ffd-3c0b-4418-a7e0-7a72eef45e1d Thu, 27 Feb 2025 19:37:10 -0500 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': House GOP plan targets Medicaid
社交媒体如何传播饮食错误信息，专家说的是必须改变的系统评价揭示了Instagram和YouTube作为营养误导的主要枢纽，特别是促进与正交异常和Covid-19相关的未经验证的“奇迹饮食”，敦促公共卫生机构和医疗保健专业人员优先考虑数字素养和基于证据的内容。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/how-social-media-spreads-diet-misinformatione28094and-what-what-what-what-experts-say-must-change.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/how-social-media-spreads-diet-misinformatione28094and-what-what-what-what-experts-experts-say-say-say-say-must-change.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A53075D3-1E6C-4070-A266-CDFB1330C19E Thu, 27 Feb 2025 18:37:00 -0500 How social media spreads diet misinformation—and what experts say must change
财富差异会影响远程医疗的心理保健服务约翰·霍普金斯彭博公共卫生学院的研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，与从2021年中期至2024年中期的马里兰州低能卫律师社区的抑郁症患者相比，马里兰州高养护社区抑郁症患者的心理健康就诊的可能性更大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/wealth-disparities-impact-telehealth-act-telehealth-access-for-mental-mental-health-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/wealth-disparities-impact-telehealth-act-telehealth-access-for-mental-mental-health-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A5EE4856-024C-453D-AC27-AC27-017EBFAF71FC Thu, 27 Feb 2025 14:26:48 -0500 Wealth disparities impact telehealth access for mental health care
